8 bit.gadget: Cheat Cartridge. Extra Credits in Heist.
8 bit.starpower: Boosted Booster. Plugged In for Gem Grab.

amber.gadget: Fire Starters in open maps. Dancing Flames in closed maps.
amber.gear: Reload Speed and Vision/Damage. She's good with other gadgets as well.

angelo.gadget: Master Fletcher. Stinging Flight isn't a bad option either.

barley.gadget: Sticky Syrup in ladder and for agro. Herbal Tonic good in Ranked.
barley.starpower: Extra Noxious. Medical Use against other throwers.

bea.starpower: Honeycomb. Insta Beaload is also good.

belle.gadget: Nest Egg. Reverse Polarity has some uses in certain maps.
belle.starpower: Positive Feedback. Grounded underrated in Ranked against agro.
belle.gear: Reload Speed and Shield. You can use Damage/Health instead of Shield in Heist.

berry.gadget: Friendship is Great. Healthy Additives in Heist.
berry.tips: Attack is impact + damage zone after. Damage zone doesn't stack. Weak vs tanks

brock.gadget: Rocket Fuel. Rocket Laces is okay in ladder against unknown enemies.
brock.starpower: More Rockets! Rocket No. 4 can be good in Knockout and Bounty.

bull.gadget: Stomper. T-Bone Injector can be used for Heist base races.
bull.starpower: Tough Guy. Berserker hard to get value out of.
bull.gear: Damage and Health/Super Charge (if you're Pika).

buster.starpower: Kevlar Vest. If enemy has no knockback use Blockbuster.

buzz.gadget: Reserve Buoy. X-Ray-Shades is very good on grassy maps.
buzz.starpower: Eyes Sharp. Tougher Torpedo is used more in pro play.

carl.gadget: Heat Ejector. Flying Hook higher skill floor in Ranked.

chuck.gadget: Rerouting in Heist. Ghost Train outside of Heist.

clancy.gadget: Tactical Retreat. Spen still likes Snappy Shooting.
clancy.tips: Stage one sucks and requires getting out of asap.

colette.starpower: Mass Tax. Push It can be good into some tanks.

colt.gadget: Speedloader. Silver Bullet good for opening up map.
colt.starpower: Slick Boots. Magnum Special is good in Heist.

cordelius.gadget: Replanting. Poison Mushroom for bushy maps or Showdown.

crow.starpower: Extra Toxic. Carrion Crow in Heist.

darryl.gadget: Tar Barrel. Recoiling Rotator in Heist.

draco.tips: Pairs great with Kit, Byron when supering. Great for when pressure is needed (hot zone, etc.)

dynamike.gadget: Satchel Charge. Some pros use Fidget Spinner.

el primo.gadget: Suplex Supplement. Asteroid Belt is okay for occassionally opening the map.
el primo.starpower: El Fuego. Meteor Rush is better in Brawl Ball.

fang.gadget: Corn-Fu. Roundhouse Kick is good for combos and clip farming.
fang.starpower: Divine Soles. Fresh Kicks better against bad players.

finx.gadget: Back to the Finxture. No Escape is underrated in specific matchups.

frank.gadget: Irresistible Attraction. Active Noise Cancelling is decent.

gale.gadget: Twister. Spring Ejector good for certain maps (Parallel Plays).

gene.starpower: Magic Puffs. Spirit Slap against tanks.
gene.gear: Talk to the Hand and Vision/Shield.

gray.starpower: New Perspective. Fake Injury in Knockout and Bounty.

griff.starpower: Business Resilience. Keep the Change into all tanks.
griff.tips: Midrange wallbreaker. Use on any map you need a wallbreak + midrange on

grom.gadget: Radio Check. Watchtower in Center Stage.

hank.gadget: Barricade. Water Balloons higher skill floor but good into tanks.

jacky.starpower: Counter Crush. Hardy Hard Hat for worse matchups.

janet.gear: Speed and Vision for grassy maps. Otherwise Damage and Shield.

jessie.gadget: Spark Plug. Recoil Spring in Heist

juju.starpower: Numbing Needles. Guarded Gris-Gris into ranged enemies.

kenji.tips: Can dash into wall and then use swipe to wall peak for more dmg/range

kit.starpower: Overly Attached in 3v3. Power Hungry in Showdown.

leon.starpower: Smoke Trails. Invisiheal is the better competitive choice.

lola.starpower: Sealed with a Kiss. Improvise decent in Heist.

lou.gadget: Cryo Syrup. Some pros use Ice Block

max.starpower: Run N Gun. Super Charged against passive team compositions.

meeple.gadget: Mansions of Meeple. Ragequit is good into assassins.
meeple.starpower: Rule Bending. Do Not Pass Go can be good depending on the meta.

melodie.gadget: Interlude. Perfect Pitch can work in weird maps.

mico.starpower: Record Smash (since he's only good in Heist/Showdown). Monkey Business for player interactions.

moe.starpower: Skipping Stones. Speeding Ticket for Bounty and Knockout to move up and extend your range.

nani.gadget: Return to Sender. Warpin' Time sometimes in Heist.
nani.starpower: Tempered Steel. Spen still thinks that Autofocus is better.

nita.gadget: Faux Fur. Use Bear Paws against tanks.
nita.starpower: Bear With Me. Hyper Bear for Heist.

ollie.gadget: Regulate. All Eyez on Me into agro.
ollie.starpower: Renegade. Kick, Push can be useful on certain maps for pressure.

otis.gear: Speed and Vision for grassy maps. Otherwise use Damage and Gadget Cooldown.

pam.starpower: Mama's Squeeze. Mama's Hug in a very open map.

pearl.gear: Shield and Damage/Health. Vision is good in Gem Grab.

penny.starpower: Heavy Coffers. Run Master Blaster in Brawl Ball.
penny.gear: Health/Damage (Heist) and Pet Power (Heist and Hot Zone)/Shield.

piper.gadget: Homemade Recipe. Auto Aimer in Gem Grab.
piper.starpower: Snappy Sniping. Ambush can be okay in very bushy maps.

poco.gadget: Tuning Fork. Protective Tunes is good in Ranked.
poco.starpower: Screeching Solo. Da Capo! has good synergy with other brawlers.
poco.gear: Gadget Cooldown and any other gear.

r t.gadget: Out of Line. Hacks! in long range matchups.
r t.starpower: Recording. If you never have to split use Quick Maths.

rico.gadget: Multiball Launcher. Bouncy Castle for Knockout and Bounty.
rico.starpower: Super Bouncy. Robo Retreat better for bad matchup (wall breakers, throwers, assassins).

rosa.gadget: Both gadgets unnecessary. Grow Light can be annoying and Unfriendly Bushes can be helpful on certain maps.

ruffs.gadget: Air Support. Take Cover can be good into countering single shot brawlers.

shelly.starpower: Band-Aid. Use Shell Shock in Brawl Ball.

spike.gadget: Life Plant. Popping Pincushion on Heist.
spike.starpower: Fertilize. Curveball is still very good.

squeak.starpower: Super Sticky. Chain Reaction is good with Windup.

stu.gadget: Speed Zone. Breakthrough in for individual matchups.
stu.gear: Damage and Shield. All other gears are viable as well.

surge.gadget: Power Surge. Power Shield for Brawl Ball noob stomping.

tara.gadget: Support From Beyond. Psychic Enhancer against pierce.
